item.title: 美国扩大对油轮的制裁限制伊朗石油运输
item.description: 美国已经制裁了更多被指控参与伊朗石油贸易的油轮和公司，伊朗石油贸易产生的收入支持了德黑兰支持的民兵组织，如哈马斯和胡塞武装。【原文：The US has sanctioned more tankers and companies it alleges are involved in the trade of Iranian oil, which generates revenue that supports Tehran-backed militia groups such as Hamas and the Houthis.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备在通胀之战中再次大幅加息
item.description: 由于俄罗斯央行在应对近期远高于预期的通胀率方面仍然收效甚微，俄罗斯准备在周五再次积极加息。【原文：Russia is poised for another aggressive rate hike on Friday as the central bank continues to find little success in tackling inflation that has recently accelerated well above its forecast.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长称，菲律宾可能在 2025 年降息开局
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）周五表示，菲律宾央行对在明年的首次货币政策会议上再次降息持开放态度。【原文：The Philippine central bank is open to delivering another rate cut in its first monetary policy meeting next year, Governor Eli Remolona said Friday.】

item.title: 颠覆性的 10 分钟送货服务扩展到印度食品行业
item.description: 随着数字平台之间争夺急不可耐的消费者的竞争愈演愈烈，印度的食品外卖应用程序承诺在 10 分钟内将咖喱饭和热饮送到顾客家门口。【原文：Food delivery apps in India are promising to bring biryani to hot beverages at customers’ doorsteps in under 10 minutes, as competition for impatient consumers intensifies among digital platforms.】

item.title: 在创下 190 亿美元首次公开募股纪录后，印度又迎来了辉煌的一年
item.description: 印度已成为世界上首次公开募股等交易的主要市场之一，由于投资者抢占先机，印度今年的筹资额打破了历史纪录。【原文：India has become one of the world’s leading markets for deals such as initial public offerings, smashing its record for money raised this year as investors snap up opportunities.】

item.title: 索尼创下历史新高，令投资者更加看好游戏产业的蓬勃发展
item.description: 索尼集团期待已久的股价创下历史新高，这让看涨的投资者和分析师们信心倍增，他们认为视频游戏的强劲前景将使索尼的收益延续到 2025 年。【原文：Sony Group Corp.’s long-awaited rise to record highs has emboldened bullish investors and analysts, who see gains extending into 2025 on a robust outlook for video games.】

item.title: 2025 年降息预期减弱，黄金周线下挫
item.description: 在美联储下调明年降息预期后，交易员们对利率前景进行了权衡，黄金周线下跌。【原文：Gold headed for a weekly drop, as traders weighed the interest-rate outlook after the Federal Reserve dialed back rate-cut expectations for next year.】

item.title: 收藏玩偶热助推中概股大涨 370
item.description: 在上个月《名利场》杂志的一段视频中，大型 K-pop 乐队 Blackpink 的成员丽莎分享了她对中国公司 Pop Mart International Group Ltd. 玩具的痴迷。【原文：In a Vanity Fair video last month, Lisa, a member of mega K-pop band Blackpink, shared her obsession with toys from Chinese company Pop Mart International Group Ltd.】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德预测特朗普当选后将掀起创业公司并购浪潮
item.description: 投资者凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）在接受采访时表示，唐纳德-特朗普的当选将迎来一波私营企业收购潮，而此前这些收购潮因繁文缛节而进展缓慢，她在采访中还重申了她对比特币的超级看涨观点。【原文：The election of Donald Trump will usher in a wave of private-company purchases that had previously been slowed by red tape, investor Cathie Wood said in an interview in which she also reiterated her ultra-bullish view on Bitcoin.】

item.title: 日本通胀回升，日本央行寻求更多加息数据
item.description: 随着日本央行在决定下一次加息时间之前继续分析数据，日本的关键通胀指标三个月来首次走强。【原文：Japan’s key inflation gauge strengthened for the first time in three months as the central bank continues to parse data before deciding on the timing of its next interest rate hike.】

item.title: 美元因美联储前景而走强，原油将面临周度下跌
item.description: 由于美元走强对油价构成压力，石油价格一周来持续下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a weekly decline as a strengthening US dollar pressured prices.】

item.title: 2024 年日本金融股领涨的原因是什么？
item.description: 在货币政策逐步正常化和激进投资激增的利好影响下，今年日本股市的上涨为 2025 年取得更多潜在收益奠定了基础。【原文：This year’s equity rally in Japan has laid the groundwork for more potential gains in 2025, on tailwinds from the gradual normalization of monetary policy and a surge in activist investment.】

item.title: 中国顶级农作物贸易商押宝巴西，削弱美国贸易战的影响
item.description:
中粮集团将于明年在桑托斯开设一个大型港口码头，这是其最新的国际投资项目，旨在与全球最大的食品商竞争。【原文：

Cofco is set to open a massive port terminal in Santos next year, its latest international splurge as it jostles to contend with the world’s biggest food merchants.

】

item.title: Wesfarmers 将以 7.7 亿澳元的价格将 Coregas 出售给 Nippon Sanso
item.description: Wesfarmers Ltd. 将以 7.7 亿澳元（4.8 亿美元）的价格将其 Coregas 工业气体部门出售给 Nippon Sanso Holdings Corp. 的子公司。【原文：Wesfarmers Ltd. will sell its Coregas industrial gas unit to a subsidiary of Nippon Sanso Holdings Corp. for A$770 million ($480 million).】

item.title: 新西兰进口下降有助于缩小年度贸易赤字
item.description: 由于经济疲软抑制了进口需求，新西兰出现了近三年来最小的年度贸易赤字。【原文：New Zealand posted its smallest annual trade deficit in almost three years as a weak economy curbed demand for imports.】

item.title: 东南亚初创企业错失人工智能推动的科技热潮
item.description: 东南亚正迅速成为英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）等人工智能领军企业的投资热点，这些企业正在向云服务和数据中心投入资金。但该地区的年轻科技公司却未能利用这一热潮。【原文：Southeast Asia is fast emerging as an investment hot spot for AI leaders like Nvidia Corp. and Microsoft Corp., which are plowing money into cloud services and data centers. But the region’s own young tech companies are failing to capitalize on the boom.】

item.title: 唯一赢家是中国安大略省省长向特朗普发出贸易呼吁
item.description: 加拿大最大省级经济体的领导人希望直接向特朗普政府提出反对关税的论点；他提出的理由是，如果北美国家卷入贸易战，中国将是主要受益者。【原文：The leader of Canada’s largest provincial economy wants to take his argument against tariffs directly to the Trump administration — making the case that China would be the main beneficiary if North American countries become engulfed in a trade war.】

item.title: 亚洲股市与华尔街的低迷情绪相呼应：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将低开高走，此前华尔街又经历了一个低迷的交易日，美联储鹰派中枢调整后，股市和债券走低，美元走强。【原文：Asian stocks are set to open lower after another downbeat day on Wall Street left stocks and bonds lower and the dollar stronger after the Federal Reserve’s hawkish pivot.】

item.title: TPG 就以 80 亿美元收购 Crown Castle 光纤部门进行深入谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，TPG 公司正在就以约 80 亿美元收购铁塔运营商皇冠城堡公司（Crown Castle Inc.【原文：TPG Inc. is in advanced talks to buy tower operator Crown Castle Inc.’s fiber business for about $8 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国经济反弹取决于最富裕城市的命运
item.description:
贫困省份的财政困难正在蔓延到长期以来被认为不会出现经济放缓的富裕地区。这威胁着整个国家的经济。【原文：

Fiscal hardship gripping poorer provinces is spilling into wealthy regions long considered slowdown-proof. That’s threatening the nation’s entire economy.

】

item.title: 成本不足一美分的中国阿司匹林将外国公司拒之门外
item.description: 中国积极推动以价格低廉的国产仿制药取代外国名牌药，这已经对全球制药公司的本地业务造成了影响。现在，在最新公布的获得向中国医院销售常用药品合同的公司名单中，几乎找不到它们的身影。【原文：China’s aggressive drive to replace brand-name foreign drugs with dirt-cheap homegrown generics has already taken a toll on global pharmaceutical companies’ local business. Now they’re almost nowhere to be found on the latest list of companies winning contracts to sell commonly-used drugs to Chinese hospitals.】

item.title: 比特币破纪录反弹后回调加深
item.description: 比特币两天来的跌幅一度扩大至 10%，投机者在这一最大的数字资产创下历史新高后降低了风险。【原文：Bitcoin’s two-day slide extended to as much as 10% at one point with speculators paring back on risk after the largest digital-asset reached an all-time high.】

item.title: 美国钢铁公司因价格 "低迷 "而预测盈利下降
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（United States Steel Corp. ）警告称，由于美国钢材价格持续低迷以及欧洲需求环境疲软，其第四季度盈利将低于预期。【原文：United States Steel Corp. warned its fourth-quarter earnings will be lower than anticipated as steel prices remain depressed in the US and as the demand environment in Europe is weak.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将从能源转运公司路易斯安那终端购买液化天然气
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）周四发表声明称，该公司已签署了一项为期 20 年的协议，购买 Energy Transfer LP 拟在路易斯安那州设立的查尔斯湖终端出口的液化天然气。【原文：Chevron Corp. has signed a 20-year deal to buy liquefied natural gas exports from Energy Transfer LP’s proposed Lake Charles terminal in Louisiana, according to a statement from Energy Transfer released Thursday.】

item.title: 禽流感爆发，加州 11 月牛奶产量下降 9

item.title: 巴西国会进一步削弱卢拉的削减开支方案
item.description: 巴西下议院在多日内第三次削弱了旨在缓解投资者对该国财政状况恶化的担忧的支出削减方案的关键条款。【原文：For the third time in as many days, Brazil’s lower house weakened key provisions of a spending cut package meant to ease investor fears about the country’s deteriorating fiscal situation.】
